title: Just by Chance
description:
From #1 best selling author, Autumn Archer comes a light hearted insta lust romance you will adore. Heâ€™s definitely not her type. Lexi never dreamed she would have a chance encounter with a herd of cows, or their owner. And the last thing expected was to crush on the rugged guy with shaggy hair, overalls and Wellington boots at the bottom of a muddy lane. However, not everything is as it seems and Sebastian Cooper turns out to be so much more. Will he stay north of the border, or leave Lexi as a one night-stand?Grab a copy of this quick witted romance and see if Lexi & Sebastian get their HEA. 
Formerly published as Just by Chance
author: Autumn Archer
